title: 108_hr3442
content: Veterans Mental Health and Back-to-Work Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, in providing veterans' rehabilitative services, to furnish: (1) work skills training and development, (2) employment support. And (3) job development and placement. Revises provisions establishing the Committee on Care of Severely Chronically Mentally Ill Veterans to: (1) redesignate such Committee as the Committee on Care of Veterans With Serious Mental Illness. And (2) require in its annual report an assessment of how the veterans' rehabilitative services programs are serving veterans with mental illness.
